website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel design provides sturdiness and durability, all at a reasonable price.
pros: Good value in a set of 2 multi-tier stands
Both trays have decorative round handles at the top, making it easy to move the trays after they're loaded
Gold color of both units sets them apart
cons: All 3 round tiers have a slightly smaller diameter than some other units

customer_reviews.title: but was pretty simple to put together if you’re used to doing ...
customer_reviews.text: The package did not come with instructions, but was pretty simple to put together if you’re used to doing such things. Note: WASH (soapy water) AND DRY THESE THOROUGHLY PRIOR TO USE to remove tarnish. Just to be sure (because the black residue still appeared on the towel even after washing), I would suggest taking time to line the plates with baking sheets/wax paper. I did so by using the plate itself to measure a circle, fold it twice, snip the closed corner, open it up, then make a slit to the center hole. In addition to putting my mind at ease that I wasn’t poisoning my guest, doing this made clean up easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, nice looking cup cake plates, my wife is preparing for baby shower, this is perfect for cup cakes, it was easy and simple to put together, there was no instruction paper though but easy to figure out, got a bit extra washers left, don’t if it is spare parts or I just didn’t assemble right, it stands sturdy so I keep those extra washers as spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: 看你妈看，叫爸爸

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these two cake stands. I expected them to be of lesser quality since they weren't much money but they are really nice. Easy to assemble (which is also nice because I don't like putting things together but these were a breeze). I can't wait to put some little cakes, macarons, or finger sandwiches on them. So dainty but well made.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: The Two Set of Three Gold Tier Cake Stand/Fruit Plate was perfect for my parents 50th anniversary celebration. We put Italian and wedding cookies on one and Scachatta pizza on the other. They looked beautiful, were sturdy and held a lot of food items. One person even tried to talk us into giving them to her. We love this product and will be using them for future celebrations.

customer_reviews.title: They are shining
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with this rack. It is so rich looking and because of the material, the foods don’t slide. It is such a beautiful item. Look, aren’t they shining haha, Overall the product is exactly as expected and I would recommend this product!

Luckily lo y, they supply you with extras. Despite the threading issue, I believe these are absolutely worth the value and will be a gorgeous addition to my baby shower tea party!

customer_reviews.title: Should assemble/inspect immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving these stands, I have them a cursory inspection for general quality & they seemed fine. Today, the day before the event I was to use them for, I attempted to put them together-they are missing the ONE piece that holds them together and are now just plates with holes in them. If you purchase these, put them together RIGHT AWAY. Also, upon closer inspection, although the finish appears fine, some fool STAMPED their name and "patent product" on every one of them! (See photo) It's not tiny either, it measures 3cm. Uber tacky!

They do not look cheap at all. Come with tons of washers to put in between the hardware & the plates. They held up beautifully. I loaded them with tarts, tangerines, chocolate strawnerries, sandwiches, & they could have held a lot more. I’m so happy. My only regret is that I didn’t get two or even three sets.

As other reviewers have mentioned, they do have the brand name embossed on the bottom, which isn't ideal...but they were cheap and honestly, once filled with treats, no one is going to see. They also packed up very well into a small box for storage, which is always a bonus.

product_meta.title: Two Set of Three Tier Cake Stand and Fruit Plate by Imillet -Stainless Steel Stand of Golden for Cakes Desserts Fruits Candy Buffet Stand for Wedding &Home&Party Serving Platter (2 pack) …
feature_bullets: Upgrated design from others: Heavier and thicker design than others so as to hold more weighted fruit. It won’t lean a bit even if much weight on one side for the special design of extra plate at the bottom of the plate.

Select Quality Material: Made of stainless steel which can stand more weight and of decent look. It never rust, tarnish, or discolor and stays shiny gold color. More convenient and safety than the ceramic plates.
Elegant Art Design: Not only fruits & cakes & desserts plate, but also elegant decoration for your sweet home. In aesthetic design, flawless for dining room or table decoration. Suitable for gifts.

Wide Application: Lovely gold 3 tiered serving plate is perfect for dinner parties, get together's, holiday dinners, or just keeping it out in your kitchen year round. It maximizes space because it gives you 3 plates to put things on instead of just 1.
Convenient to Use: Easy to assemble only take minutes to connect the pieces and tighten everything up. Also can be dismantled when not use, convenient to store and carry.
